verbose_text: Immunostaining analyses were performed to determine the effects of DMSO on mitochondria mediated apoptosis in 2-cell embryos exposed to 2% DMSO for 24 h. DMSO exposure induced the translocation of phosphorylated p53 (a pro apoptotic marker) from the cytosol to the nucleus, and decreased the expression of Bcl-2 (an anti-apoptotic protein).
